name: Clemorot's Nuclear Derby
description:
In this strategy fangame made for Blinky's Adventure FanJam 2022, you play as Clemorot, a Lightling who got captured by a scientist Meklanen. Meklanen offered Clemorot to play a game of "Nuclear Derby" on an old console with him, while they wait for Blinky (Clemorot's cousin) to come save Clemorot.

Your goal is to mine resources such as Copper and Silver. Then on your base, ores will be used to create Mining Robots to collect ores automatically, Rockets to defend your base and Upgrades to move faster.  And you'll need a lot of ore if you want to defend from enemy batteries.
